China says it is willing to provide help to Japan on earthquakeChina is willing to provide necessary help to Japan on the massive earthquake that struck the country on New Year's Day, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 07:49:51 GMT 7A6SNU6RYNPA3DQG3BFJ5LKY7E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-it-is-willing-provide-help-japan-earthquake-2024-01-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia says Ukraine attacks Belgorod region again with missiles and dronesUkraine launched 12 missiles and several drones in the early hours of Wednesday on Russia's southern region of Belgorod, Russia's defence ministry and local authorities said. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 07:49:16 GMT JFSTCFCTTBMOTMGQGFAU2DCJQY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-ukraine-attacks-belgorod-region-again-with-missiles-drones-2024-01-03/Reuters世界欧洲
One dead in Belgium as heavy rainfall hits the countryA 59-year-old woman died in Belgium's East Flanders province on Tuesday after being hit by a blown-away fence during a period of heavy rainfall in the country, local governor Carina Van Cauter said in a statement on Wednesday. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 06:46:33 GMT HPR4RZD3SVMALLCJO6IQMGCDVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/one-dead-belgium-heavy-rainfall-hits-country-2024-01-03/Reuters世界欧洲
'Hawkish' China military squeeze on Taiwan likely after electionThe arms race across the Taiwan Strait and Chinese military pressure against the island Beijing claims as its "sacred" territory is unlikely to end no matter who wins Taiwan's closely watched elections. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 06:16:16 GMT Q5GSSYV47BIZZJOXQINDSSZS6M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hawkish-china-military-squeeze-taiwan-likely-after-election-2024-01-03/Yew Lun Tian, James Pomfret世界亚太地区
Overseas figures refute allegations in Hong Kong security trial for Jimmy LaiSeveral overseas activists, right campaigners and politicians named in a national security trial for Hong Kong democrat Jimmy Lai refuted allegations levelled by a government prosecutor in court that they colluded with him. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 06:01:14 GMT LWWCLGPMKZNELNTNP2IPCPPDWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/overseas-figures-refute-allegations-hong-kong-security-Trial-jimmy-lai-2024-01-03/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界中国
India transport workers call off protest after talks with govtA strike across India involving bus, truck and tanker drivers was called off after two days following assurance from the government that new laws for hit-and-run accidents will not be implemented until further talks with union representatives. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 05:08:55 GMT PPUSJGDLRJJVJDDTIZJIMYNQG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-transport-workers-call-off-protest-after-talks-with-govt-2024-01-03/Tanvi Mehta世界印度
US says no damage reported after latest Houthi attack in Red SeaIranian-backed Houthi militants fired two anti-ship ballistic missiles into the Southern Red Sea, though no damage was reported, the U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) said late on Tuesday. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 04:53:15 GMT WQDWOLLJGJJPJNOASXMPCR76UY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-says-no-damage-reported-after-latest-houthi-attack-red-sea-2024-01-03/Reuters世界中东
Police probe possible negligence in Tokyo runway collision - mediaPolice are investigating whether a crash between an airliner and a smaller plane at a Tokyo airport may involve professional negligence, media reported on Wednesday, as transport authorities began inspecting the charred wreckage for clues. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 04:27:57 GMT TD3ONQ27TZJG7CWJ746FMDWXIY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/police-probe-possible-negligence-tokyo-runway-collision-2024-01-03/Kaori Kaneko, Lisa Barrington, Daniel Leussink世界亚太地区
China unveils new images of its next-generation aircraft carrierChinese state media unveiled new images of China's most advanced aircraft carrier yet, including next generation launch tracks that can catapult a wider range of aircraft from its deck. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 04:02:17 GMT QR3ILMVCYVLRLEYTFDZE3GHK6U https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-unveils-new-images-its-next- Generation-aircraft-carrier-2024-01-03/Reuters世界中国
Thai PM proposes $102 billion budget to parliamentThai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin on Wednesday announced a 3.48 trillion baht ($101.52 billion) budget for the second half of the current fiscal year, kicking off a three-day debate among lawmakers. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 03:50:33 GMT QK2ZPRIGMVJ3PAIWP7UZLDUGEY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-pm-srettha-proposes-1015-billion-budget-parliament-2024-01-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
Indonesia election watchdog summons president's son over alleged violationIndonesia's election watchdog has summoned President Joko Widodo's son, the leading presidential candidate's running mate, for questioning over an alleged campaign violation, an election official said. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 03:49:50 GMT KI3B52NVNFKKFFFIUE5I7PLNTY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-election-watchdog-summons-presidents-son-over-alleged-violation-2024-01-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
